text: I chose Education Sciences because I want to become teacher in elementary school. I discoverded this during two days in a class with a teacher who named Miss Alex Dupont, she works in the Jeanne d'Arc School. So, I do two days where I work with her, and I help chidren with difficultes. During those two days I discover that I love very much the work with chlidren and now I see Miss Alex Dupont in private moment and I love help her to do a lot of preparation for her class. When I knew that I want to become teacher, I research the studies that I need. I can do French Licence, Mathematic Licence, Sciences Licence and many others. Moreover, when I see Education Sciences that I d'ont know what is it, indeed i research because, I don't want do ten or twenty hours on French or Mathematics... So, in ma highschool i see a girl who was in Licence Three of Education Sciences and I knew : it's that i want  because the Education Sciences regroup many subjects that I don't know and it change the routine of the subjects of school who oit's always French or Philosophy, Biologie, English, Spanish, Sport etc...
